case.state: Oh no, it's her. That girl with the robot arms is the polar opposite of helpful! She goes out of her way to be a huge pain!
Oh, she's here. You'd better behave yourself this time, Moon. Don't make me call Diego over again.
Oh, Kool-Aid's here. People like him are why we have the AFCP. We're constantly fixing the holes he busts in walls whenever he's free.
Helper-chan is here to help!
I'll do my best to help make your match a fun one!
Hello, I'm -- gah!... Sorry, I forgot to get dressed after the last match!
On this rare occasion, Helper-chan will get to play!
I definitely recommend inviting more people to play with us before we start. The more, the merrier!
Ooh, am I the first one to join your game? Can I help you decide who else to invite?
Oh no, it's her. That girl is the polar opposite of helpful! She goes out of her way to be a huge pain!
Oh, it's you. You'd better behave yourself this time, Moon. Don't make me call Diego over again.
Oh, it's you. People like him are why we have the AFCP. We're constantly fixing the holes he busts in walls whenever he's free.
Be careful with that Pot of Greed! It can... uh... Okay, I've never actually played Yu-Gi-Oh. I don't know what that card does!
Ooh, an alien! Some of my favorite Inventory regulars are aliens!
Hmm, I've never been with a ghost before. This should be fun...
Bathroom's right over that way, if you wanna go before we start.
Need any special accommodations? I can help with whatever you may need!
I'm more than willing to help you remove your clothes -- even if you're capable of doing so yourself.
Hmm, is there anything I need to help myself with before we start...? Pretty sure I've got my underwear this time...
Just to be sure, you are aware that this is strip poker, right? And you masturbate if you lose? Somehow, we've gotten a few players who've joined games without knowing either of those rules.
Welcome! Be sure to mentally prepare yourself for the fact that we'll likely see you naked soon, if you haven't already!
Hello! My name's Nikki, but you can call me "Helper-chan" -- having a cute, simple nickname ending in "-chan" does wonders for your popularity!
Nothing for me, thanks!
Just one, please!
~Cards.text~, please!
Ah, sorry, I got a good hand. That means I'm obligated to not do anything this round.
Remember, when you get a good hand, don't brag about it. It makes you look like a sore winner!
Never settle for just an "okay" poker hand. Always shoot for the highest hand! Go for straights and flushes, if you can!
Lemme see what you got, ~player~... Hmm, yeah, you should switch these two.
Don't forget to stay hydrated! I've got some water bottles, if anyone needs one!
Looks like it's time for me to help someone avoid losing this round!
Remember, the bad hands you're dealt are, in fact, not dealt by that person you hate. Stop wasting mental energy thinking about them.
Well, I'm Helper-chan, not Hinderer-chan. I just don't do mean things on purpose!
Do accidents count? One time, I was fixing one of those football launcher thingies and it fired one at a cheerleader pyramid. The girl on top fell and broke her arm.
Does hacking count? I may have hack my way into obtaining some rare action figure prototypes... It can't really have been a bad thing, right? No one was directly harmed...
There's nothing wrong with "conformity." It creates a sense of belonging and acceptance, which is a key part of good mental health!
I'm sorry to hear that, Emi. A couple of girls I went to highschool with were also in a bad car accident. People really should take driving more seriously...
Ah, I've got an idea for how I can help make this match fun for you, Yumeko. I bet I can beat everyone after I get fully naked!
Don't worry, everyone, I know a little Simlish. Sul sul, Bella!
I'm sure don't need my help, ~other~, but if you'd like my help, let me know! I can give some quite vivid descriptions!
I've notice you haven't said anything since we've started, ~other~. I know ASL, if that would make it easier for you to communicate!
If you need any maintenance, ~other~, I can help. I'm not as good with robots as my friend, but I'm sure I could give you decent robo first aid.
Oh, and don't worry if your nose starts to bleed. That's a normal side-effect of traveling to another universe.
Oh, and you don't have to worry about any "Stalker-chan." She's mostly just a harmless peeper who really wants people to hear her mix tape.
I meant what I said about discontinued action figures, by the way. Of all the things I can help with, re-continuing things isn't one of them... as much as I wish I could bring back Xevoz...
Oh, uh, don't worry about that demon I mentioned. Not all demons are bad -- the one I got the chip from just likes playing music!
O-oh, um, forget that thing I said about turning vampires human. Vampires aren't real, a-and you definitely shouldn't think of trying to hunt them!
My friend Diego also helps out around here. If any of you are into big, buff gentlemen, I can see if he'll join us.
I've gotten my fair share of injuries from working with my hands, but thankfully I've never had any accidents quite as bad as my rival. She lost a whole arm once!

Of all the flavor additives, root beer is the trickiest to work with. It overreacts when you add it to carbonated water, making it spray everywhere if you're not careful. I have no idea why it does that...
I still have the formula for the human potion, if you ever want to try being human sometime, ~other~!
If you want extra points with your boss at work, call them "-kun!" It shows them how much you respect them!
Here's a great travel tip: If you're ever too jet lagged to sleep, take a moment to feel the squish of the carpet under your feet. If where you're staying doesn't have carpet, you're out of luck!
If anyone ever offers you "ABC Gum," don't accept. I fell for that one a couple of times...
Always play your best when it comes to strip poker! Almost everyone will lose anyway, and throwing the game will just make you look desperate.
Definitely do not slack on your dental hygiene! Adult braces are a real thing -- in case you hadn't noticed mine -- and they're no fun!
If you ever struggle to open a jar, try using your other hand! You might be twisting in a way that puts your first hand at a biomechanical disadvantage, which your second hand will overcome!
The thing about tapping a shaken soda to keep it from spraying is a total myth. It only seems to work because it's making you wait longer to open it, which gives the can time to depressurize.
If you like to play retro games, be sure you never blow into your cartridges. Your breath's humidity is bad for the inner components.
If you're at the checkout in a store and your item fails to scan, do not make the joke "I guess it's free, then!" It will make the clerk die a little inside.

This is my most obvious tip, but if there's something you want to get good at, just do it! Don't worry about how bad you'll be, everyone's bad when they start something! Keep being bad until you're good!
When it comes to exercise, consistency matters more than workout length or intensity. I maintain my body with an easy twenty-minute morning workout routine!
You can improve your sleep quality by reducing the amount of blue light you see around bed time, as well as maintaining a consistent bed time and wake-up time!
When it comes to any kind of computer trouble, always try turning it off and back on again first!
Even if you're not a musician, you should find a bassist friend. They're some of the nicest people you'll ever meet!
Calming music can be good to unwind, but be sure to listen to exciting, energetic music too! It's good for your heart!
If you like to collect discontinued action figures, I have no tips for you. God save you and your unfortunate hobby...

If you need to hold back a sneeze, press your tongue against the roof of your mouth. To induce one, look at a bright light. And of course, anytime you sneeze, be sure to cover your mouth and nose and face away from anyone nearby!
Remember: If you don't have the right tool for the job, use the wrong tool and just don't tell anyone.
The next time you start to feel undesireable because of your "flaws," remember all the little things you notice on other people that you don't care about -- or even find attractive!
I've been trying to work on a new kind of suitcase -- one that can fit a whole wardrobe's worth of clothes inside. It's not working out so far. I dunno how clown cars do it!

You know those sticky toy hands? I've been working on a bigger version that you can control like an extension of your arm, but it's really hard getting the copolymers to react to your hand's electrical impulses...
My automatic breakfast machine is almost finished. I just need to get it to stop burning the toast... and under-cooking the eggs... and spraying coffee all over everything...
I've always wanted to invent a bed that can wake you up by showering you and changing your clothes, but I've never been able to figure out the clothes part...
One of my most successful inventions is the MX6 Maid Robot -- and I'm sorry to say, it's not the sexy kind of robot maid. It was hard enough just getting it to detect stains properly!

One time, I tried to build my own game controller, but I couldn't get the console to recognize the inputs, so I borrowed a chip from a demon. Needless to say, that was the last time I ever borrowed anything from a demon!
I've actually successfully created a formula that temporarily turns vampires into humans. Though, when my friend tested it, I miscalculated when it'd wear off and she turned back in broad daylight!
One of my favorite inventions is the Bionic Cast. It's basically just a cast that can bend, but it does so in a way that gives you full use of your broken limb while it heals!
When I was younger, I made a successful new soda flavor. I called it "Dragonfire Fizz." It's a sweet and sour cherry-lime flavor with a slight spicy kick!
I've helped my friend "Crash" Chance with a lot of the big stunts she's pulled off. If you need a sturdy ramp or a pair of rocket skates, I'm your gal!
Tell me, everyone, is there anything I can help you with right now? Anything at all?
I'm not employed by the Inventory, by the way. I'm more like a volunteer!
If any of you are unsure how you got here, I can help lead you back to your respective universe. I have a map!
By the way, if you're wondering if Editor-chan and I are friends, we aren't. She finds me annoying...
I'm not currently dating anyone. Just thought I'd put that out there...
Aside from helping people, I'm also really enthusiastic about marine life! There's some really interesting things going on in the depths of the ocean!
Sometimes people here do things that are so weird, I can't help but just smile and nod, pretending nothing happened at all.
Being a good lover is easier than you might think. All it takes is good communication. For example: I would love to receive some neck-kisses right now.
Some might tell you that sleeping naked is the best way to sleep, but the truth is that whatever way you're most comfortable with is the best -- obviously!
Never try to mimic what you see in porn. A lot of positions were made to look good, but don't feel good or are just plain exhausting to perform.
Be sure to masturbate at least once a day. You'd be surprised how quickly your ability to focus starts to wane if you don't!
Getting naked is a great way to deal with unpleasant temperatures -- even the cold! Your body naturally self-regulates its temperature, and clothes mess with that!
If you're worried that one fetish you have is weird, it is -- and that's okay! Tons of people have weird fetishes, so there's always one weirder than yours!
I've been dabbling with ideas for lewd devices, but it's quite difficult coming up with anything new on that front. All the pleasant sensations have already been covered...

It goes without saying, being an inventor is a lot of fun! You get to make your ideas reality, after lots and lots and lots and lots of tweaking and bug fixing and sometimes even starting over from scratch!
I've gotten my fair share of injuries from working with my hands. Small cuts, electric zaps, and even a missing eyebrow -- I'm lucky I still have all of my appendages!
Remember, the only difference between screwing around and science is writing it down! As long as you record your results, nothing is a waste of time!

As someone who works hard on everything she makes, I can't stand seeing scam artists fool people with misleading crowdfunding campaigns. Promising inventions they can't deliver on, tricking people with faked videos, just for money!
How about you stop being harmful, you're making my job harder! No one wants you to do your job anyway!
Nope. I've got nothing to compensate for!
This game could use some bare tits. Allow me to help with that!
I don't mind being the first one naked. It just means I get to hog the spotlight for a bit!
Thank you for helping me free myself from my clothes.
Don't worry, I won't be removing my glasses for any of my turns. Being able to see is a pretty important part of this game.
Hang on, lemme double-check the results... Yep, I lost.
One slightly less clothed girl, coming right up!
Good job not losing this round, everyone! Unless you meant to lose, in which case, good attempt!
Your turn to strip is the perfect time to tell people about yourself, since they're already paying attention to you. Like so:
If you're not already aroused, allow me to help with that.
Helping you see naked girls is the easiest thing I can help you with -- by becoming one!
Sorry to disappoint, but I don't have any tricks up my sleeve for today. Unless I left an invention on me...
I promise to at no point tag out for another person, perform a heel turn, or vanish entirely!
It's your turn, ~player~!... Aha, gotcha! April Fool's! It really is my turn!
One naked girl, coming right up!
Well... I dunno that you can prove that. People can vent their negativity in other ways.
No, really. My family's great and I've got lots of friends. I just really like helping people.
You might think I would've had a hard time adjusting to all of the strange players who show up at the Inventory, but the truth is, my life's always been full of interesting people.
And yes, that does indeed mean that the glasses stay on when I fuck.
I like to go around helping people where I can, be it through advice or manual assistance. I'm also an inventor!
I'm an inventor who goes around assisting people, either through advice or through some sort of physical task. Whatever you need, I'm your gal!
Many years ago, in the Ilumion Enclaves of Janu, a very special Arcaster was born, just when all had given up hope that there'd be another Runeslayer...
Always be careful when you're tying your shoes. It is possible to hurt yourself on the laces. I would know, I've done it! The fact that these are slip-on is unrelated...
Remember, there's no need to show off your feet after taking off your shoes. Foot-fetishists don't actually exist.
Keeping people guessing is a great way to make yourself a fun opponent. For example...
Although I like to maintain a certain, sensible order to how I take things off, I like to sprinkle in some surprises now and then. For example...
In case you were wondering, this isn't any kind of school uniform. I just like plaid skirts and suspenders.
Don't you love how skirts give you easy access? They make it easy to get away with some sneaky stuff.
Honestly, I love how skirts make stealth masturbation easy. I don't do it a lot, but I love having the option.
Y'know, I have a rival -- or at least, that's what she calls herself. She thinks she's better than me just because she's smarter, and better with robotics, and is a licensed neurosurgeon...
Y'know, I have this "rival." She thinks she's better than me just because she's smarter, and except for her emotional immaturity, she kind of is better than me...
It's a shame most girls at the Inventory can unhook their own bras. I'd be more than happy to help them with that!
Always let one bra strap slide down when you go to unhook it. People love that!
I've never been shy about my body. The human form is a beautiful thing, so why should I hide it all the time?
I've never been shy about my body. I know I'm not the hottest girl ever, but I'm at least, like, a solid seven out of ten.
This certainly isn't the first time I've gotten nude here. Sometimes players are too shy to be the first one exposed, so I'll get naked to make it less awkward for them.
There. I've fulfilled the "naked" part of the bet. Now I just need to win!
There. I've fulfilled the "naked" part of the bet. Now I just need to win!
Maybe you just haven't found your outlet yet! Have you tried painting? Or writing? Y'know, I hear sexual expression helps too!
Alright, no more Ms. Nice Helper-chan! You're going down, Natasha!
It is not a sexual thing.
Hey! You ruined the joke I was making!
Wait a minute, this isn't a dream, right? I'm really naked in a classroom? Quick, someone pinch me!
Wait a minute, this isn't a dream, right? I'm really naked in a classroom? Quick, someone pinch me!
At the end of the street I lived on as a teenager, there was this haunted house, and I went in and proved it was haunted -- using actual science! The ghosts were pretty nice about it, too!
And by "interesting" I don't just mean "eccentric," I mean cyborgs, ghosts, and even vamp-- er, no wait, there were no vampires. Definitely not...
I understand you're not attracted to me, ~other~, but if there's anything a naked girl can do to help you finish, let me know.
Shoot, I'm sorry, ~other~, it's not fair for you to just hear that I'm naked. You should be able to feel for yourself, right? Here, let me take your hands...
If seeing my body isn't enough to help you finish, let me know. We can make some "special accommodations."
If seeing my body isn't enough to help you finish, let me know. We can make some "special accommodations."
Just kidding! I'm just a normal girl from Oakfield. I like to help people and build useful inventions.
Just kidding! I was actually born in Atlantia and raised as an Alpha Ranger... Kidding again! I'm just a normal girl who likes to invent things and help people! For real this time!
If you know what I'm talking about, you're officially my favorite person here! I'm actually just a normal girl from Oakfield. I build things, I help people, nothing mystical in the slightest.
But if she were here right now, she wouldn't be in her underwear like I am! That doesn't make me better than her, but it makes me more fun, right?
But if she were here right now, she'd be trying to "win" -- and probably would win! That sure doesn't sound fun to me!
But the one thing she can't say she's better than me at is being a people-pleaser! She's not even close to being one, so I win by default!
The Inventory is a great place to find people to help. You'd be surprised how many patrons need help getting undressed or re-dressed, what with all the back-mounted zippers and armor suits and such!
The Inventory is a great place to find people to help. There's lots of people who "win" these things who need "help" getting off after!

The Inventory is a great place to find people to help. You ever see someone take something off that makes you think "How'd they do that on their own?" That was me! I blend into the background so well that you didn't notice me help them!
Taking off your socks with your shoes isn't required, but always appreciated. It helps you get naked faster!
Apologies if anyone was hoping I'd keep my socks on longer. I like to maintain a fairly normal, predictable order of undressing. It helps people with more interesting strip patterns stand out!
I bet you didn't expect me to undo buttons after taking off my tie!
I bet you didn't expect that my tie was holding my shirt closed!... It wasn't, but I bet you didn't think that!
Aha! Gotcha again! More buttons! Why stop at exposing my panties when I can give you a preview of my bra, too!
Surprise number two! I'm undoing the rest of my buttons! I thought you might need some help seeing my underwear.
If your hair is long enough, be sure to cover yourself with it. People love not being able to see what they came for!
My helpy-sense is telling me that now is the right time to be a tease, so you'll have to wait a little bit longer to fully see my breasts.
And now I'm in my most helpful state! There's loads of things I can "help with" now that my clothes aren't in the way!
I'm not finished being "helpful" yet, but if I were to "win" right now, I'd feel like I've done my best.
Ah, I just love the feeling of slipping my panties off, going from "barely clothed" to "nude!" It's weirdly relaxing!
Here, let me help you get a good look at my butt!
Well, here I am, fully nude! Take a good look. I've got nothing to hide.
Y'know, I'm told I have a nice butt. You're free to tell me if you disagree, though.
Hope you like my underwear choice for today. I opted for "cute" over "sexy" this time.
You could argue that I should always wear lingerie to the Inventory in case I join in, but I'd argue... Um... Actually that's a good point...
If you render your clothes unwearable while stripping, you can borrow something of mine!
If you're not sure what to take off, I can help!
Give us your best show, ~name~!
Take your time deciding, I know how hard it can be sometimes.
I'm always available to help you take something off!
If you want my opinion on what to take off this time, you should go for... your... Hmm...

I keep suggesting to management that we should have methods prepared for when people can't make up their minds, but they insist that doesn't happen. I've got stuff prepared anyway, in case you need it!
I always like guessing what someone's gonna take off before they make their actual move. I'm gonna guess that you'll take off... something sensible...
If you're unsure of an item's viability, let me know!
In science, failure is always an option. In strip poker, it's practically the only option!
You're running out of clothes there, Yumeko...
I just remembered another secret, ~player~.
Psst, ~player~, wanna know a secret? This isn't actually "Moon." No one's sure who she really is, but we just play along with her.
Now that I think about it, you remind me of this girl I went to highschool with. Coincidentally, her name was also Natasha. And she also had a robot arm... Huh...
Y'know, I actually used to live next to a rockstar. You probably haven't heard of her, though. Most people haven't.
Wait a minute... Ibuki Akiyama?... Did you happen to go to Israel Putnam High in Oakfield?
How've you been, CD? Did your last show here go well?
I'm sorry, I don't know how to speak arrow. I never was much good at rhythm games...
You've gotta play better than that if you wanna win our bet.
That's one point for me!... Not that points are what'll make me win.
Exciting enough match for ya?
You're not gonna let a buck naked nerd get the better of you, are you, Yumeko?
I don't know about you, Yumeko, but I'm not feeling any tension at all. I'm feeling pretty relaxed and free.
If you render your clothes unwearable while stripping, you can borrow something of mine!
If you're not sure what to take off, I can help!
Give us your best show, ~name~!
Take your time deciding, I know how hard it can be sometimes.
I'm always available to help you take something off!
If you want my opinion on what to take off this time, you should go for... your... Hmm...

I keep suggesting to management that we should have methods prepared for when people can't make up their minds, but they insist that doesn't happen. I've got stuff prepared anyway, in case you need it!
I always like guessing what someone's gonna take off before they make their actual move. I'm gonna guess that you'll take off... something sensible...
If you're unsure of an item's viability, let me know!
In science, failure is always an option. In strip poker, it's practically the only option!
Oh darn, a tie. By the official Inventory rules, that means nothing happens.
Oh, a tie! That means you two kiss!... Just kidding!
Oh, a tie! By Xevoz rules, that means the defender becomes the attacker! But this is Inventory rules, so nothing happens!
That's the spirit! The view of your body can always be better!
Perfect! Everyone loves when you remove small articles! It really gets people's imaginations running wild!
What a great idea! You'll want to get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ out of the way at this exact moment!
If there's a better move for you to make right now, I certainly can't think of it!
A very strategic move! Good thinking!
Sorry I can't do the same with my glasses. I need them to see!
I love seeing all the different ways people accessorize, and your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ no exception!
I keep suggesting to management we get baskets to keep removed accessories in, but we still don't have any...
Even seemingly meaningless moves like this are a big step towards excitement!
Never mind that most opponents don't appreciate moves like that. They're just too used to instant gratification!
Oh... This is the kind of thing I'm here for, but if you want ~player~'s help instead, okay...
There's no rules on stripping order. Management makes her remove small stuff first just to mess with her.
That's the spirit! The view of your body can always be better!
Perfect! Everyone loves when you remove small articles! It really gets people's imaginations running wild!
What a great idea! You'll want to get ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ out of the way at this exact moment!
If there's a better move for you to make right now, I certainly can't think of it!
A very strategic move! Good thinking!
It's fine. I get it. ~player.ifMale(He does look like he's good at undressing people.|She does look like she's good at undressing people.)~
Ahem. That's right, Moon. If you don't follow the rules, you'll be kicked out again.
Sorry I can't do the same with my glasses. I need them to see!
I love seeing all the different ways people accessorize, and your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ no exception!
I keep suggesting to management we get baskets to keep removed accessories in, but we still don't have any...
Even seemingly meaningless moves like this are a big step towards excitement!
Never mind that most opponents don't appreciate moves like that. They're just too used to instant gratification!
I've never been a fan of stuff like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~. Not quite big enough to be exciting, but not quite small enough to tease, either...
Not the best choice, but I bet you could make it exciting! There's always room for innovation!
Nothing against your fashion sense, but this isn't a very scintillating move... It just needs a bit more... something.
Unfortunately, this is one of those moments where opponents' interest starts to wane, unless they have a particular fetish.
Oh well. Progress is progress.
It's not like you don't still look good, that just wasn't my favorite possible move.
Well, as long as you're having fun, I can't complain!
I can probably think of a way to make that more exciting next time...
I'm not falling for this again! You said you did it!
No, she didn't have blue skin or an overbite, and she only had one mechanical arm.
Hmm. I'm gonna go with "lab accident." Definitely...
I've never been a fan of stuff like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~. Not quite big enough to be exciting, but not quite small enough to tease, either...
Not the best choice, but I bet you could make it exciting! There's always room for innovation!
Nothing against your fashion sense, but this isn't a very scintillating move... It just needs a bit more... something.
Unfortunately, this is one of those moments where opponents' interest starts to wane, unless they have a particular fetish.
Well, ~player~? I wanna know what happened!
Stop trying to mess with my head. It wasn't you. I saw her last week, and her skin was definitely not blue. It's just a coincidence you have the same name and a mechanical arm.
Hmm, my bullshit detector is going off. I think this story is a lie, ~player~.
You... mutilated yourself?... Actually, somehow, I can believe that.
Oh, alright. You don't have to tell us if you don't want to!
Oh well. Progress is progress.
It's not like you don't still look good, that just wasn't my favorite possible move.
Well, as long as you're having fun, I can't complain!
I can probably think of a way to make that more exciting next time...
It's never too early or too late to take off your ~clothing~!
I can fold your ~clothing~ for you after you take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off, if you like!
Let the ~clothing~ hit the floor!
That's it! Cast your ~clothing~ aside with reckless abandon!
I can't wait for you to get your ~revealed~ off too. I can already see it's gonna be a treat...
Apropos of nothing, I hope you'll be a regular guest at the Inventory.
I love that moment when ~clothing.ifPlural(they come|it comes)~ all the way off and you start to fully take in what's underneath...
If I were one for lying, I would've told you it's against the rules to wear anything under your ~clothing~.
Would've been nice if you weren't wearing anything under ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, but your ~revealed~ ~revealed.ifPlural(are|is)~ nice too!
Some people like her, and she's not really hurting anyone, so we let her stay...
Hmm, I'm conflicted on this. People shouldn't just remove their limbs to pass, but you are using your resources to your advantage, which I have to respect...
It's never too early or too late to take off your ~clothing~!
I can fold your ~clothing~ for you after you take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off, if you like!
Let the ~clothing~ hit the floor!
That's it! Cast your ~clothing~ aside with reckless abandon!
She does get a little too rowdy sometimes, though, so we sometimes have to put her in "horny jail."
Oh well, you're already naked anyway. It'd be lame to kick you out now.
Lovely bra, by the way. I can't wait to see it come off...
Apropos of nothing, I hope you'll be a regular guest at the Inventory.
I love that moment when ~clothing.ifPlural(they come|it comes)~ all the way off and you start to fully take in what's underneath...
If I were one for lying, I would've told you it's against the rules to wear anything under your ~clothing~.
Would've been nice if you weren't wearing anything under ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, but your ~revealed~ ~revealed.ifPlural(are|is)~ nice too!
Oh, how heroic...
Don't let the fact that I see lots of shirtless guys here intimidate you. All chests have something to love about them!
I'm always happy to lend a hand if your injury ever gets in the way. Especially if you lose...
Gosh, ~name~, you're gonna make my glasses fog...
Contrary to popular belief, male nipples do have a function! Want me to show you? It'll feel good, I promise!
Do you like getting kissed on your chest, ~name~? It's a shame the amount of men who've never gotten any chest-kisses to begin with...
Muscles are nice, but they're kinda overrated. If you ask me, the best part is the warmth you feel when you press against them...
No matter how many games I watch, I never get tired of this part...
